mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (EMAIL, PW, NAME, NICKNAME, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, GOAL, JOIN_DATE, MEMBER_TYPE, PROFILE_IMG) VALUES (#{email}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{goal}, NOW(), #{memberType}, #{profileImg})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, EMAIL, NAME, NICKNAME, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, GOAL, JOIN_DATE, MEMBER_TYPE, PROFILE_IMG FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET EMAIL = #{email}, NAME = #{name}, NICKNAME = #{nickname}, GENDER = #{gender}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday}, HEIGHT = #{height}, WEIGHT = #{weight}, GOAL = #{goal}, PROFILE_IMG = #{profileImg} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
